ygData.subject: Re: Handmade backpacks
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to have a decent Tailoring skill, a High Quality Bear pelt, and the Backpack pattern.  This will produce the handmade backpacks with 10 slots. Talarin
ygData.messageBody:
You need to have a decent Tailoring skill, a High Quality Bear pelt, and the
Backpack pattern. This will produce the handmade backpacks with 10 slots.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elf Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: chpicker <chpicker@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Handmade backpacks


> From: chpicker <chpicker@...>
>
> >I do wish they made them all stackable! I have been on a long quest for
> >handmade backpacks because of that... need all 70 slots in my locker to
hold
> >words. (one slot for the book)
>
> Where do you find handmade backpacks? Or more to the point, how do you
> MAKE them? After spending a ridiculoud amount of time and money searching
> for the answer and experimenting with combinations that don't work,
neither
> I nor any guild member have been able to figure out how to tailor a
> Backpack. If I read into your message correctly, the tailored backpacks
> have 10 slots instead of the standard 8? That answers the long-asked
> question of why backpack patterns are more expensive than backpacks.
>
> I realize this is a bit off-topic, but I have seen mention of handmade
> backpacks NOWHERE else. And no one else seems to have a clue.
>
> Thanks
> chpicker
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be
tolerated, no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders
will be banned permanently.
>
